name: Reminder
body: ### Introduction | 介紹 Reminder, beyond an image slideshow tool, has the following unique features: Reminder不僅僅是一個影像幻燈片播放工具，它具有下列獨特的功能： 1. can customize how the image is shown | 可客製化影像的呈現方式 2. automatically search and download images | 自動搜尋並下載影像 3. can embed the image with customized phrases | 可嵌入客製化的語句於影像中 P.S: for search function, `api_key` and `cx` of **google custom search** is required 搜尋功能需要指定可以從**google custom search**取得的`api_key`及`cx` ### System requirement | 系統需求 python2.7 ### Installation | 安裝 1. Install `tkinter` | 安裝`tkinter` **_linux_** apt-get install python-tk 2. Install `imageTk/PIL` | 安裝 `imageTk/PIL` _**linux**_ apt-get install python-imaging-tk _**osx**_ pip install Pillow 3. Download and extract the source and copy it into the desired directory. And have fun! 下載原始程式檔案，解開壓縮，並且複製到您想安裝的目的資料夾。 然後開始享受它帶來的樂趣吧！ ### Demo usage | 示範用法 cd _reminder_target_directory_ 1. ./main.py _config.ini_ 2. ./main.py _config_image.ini_ 3. ./main.py _config_phrase.ini_ which demonstrate the following: 這展示了下面的功能： 1. image search/download/slide-show functionality | 影像搜尋/下載/幻燈片播放 2. show image by customized setting | 客製化影像呈現的方式 3. embed image with phrases | 將語句嵌入至影像 ### Screenshot | 畫面截圖 Use Reminder as a reminder, 讓Reminder提醒您重要事項， or find some way it motivates you, 或者找到一個它帶給您激勵的方式， alternatively, decorate your screen by multiple Reminder instances! 又或者，用多個Reminder實例裝飾您的螢幕！ ### Motivation | 動機 We are creatures who can be mind-occupied by image and phrases. Hopefully, Reminder helps you determine how your precious memory space will be occupied. 我們人類，是一種容易被“目所見、耳所聞”的形象佔據思考的生物。 但願Reminder能夠幫助我們自行決定珍貴的思維空間，要如何被填滿。 ### Reference | 參考資料 [Google Custom Search](https://developers.google.com/custom-search/) ### Author | 作者 @r-kan e-mail: its_right@msn.com
